name: A.I. Shadow
desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 "@Ignister" monster you control; it gains 800 ATK, also your opponent's monsters must attack it, if able. If this face-up card in your Spell & Trap Zone leaves the field because of an opponent's effect, and is now in the GY or banished: Draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "A.I. Shadow" once per turn.
